Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $856,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Brian Fisher (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/20/1985, off Bud Black (KC)...
Traded from Toronto to Atlanta on 4/3/1987 (Going to ATL: P Chuck Crim, P Ron Musselman, C Jerry Willard, CF Junior Felix, RF Joe Carter. Going to TOR: LF Don Carroll)...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $928,571 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $928,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Atlanta to Detroit on 4/26/1989 (Going to ATL: C Matt Nokes, 1B Will Clark. Going to DET: P Tom Glavine, P Chris Hammond, C Jerry Willard, LF Glenn Wilson, 1B Larry Sheets)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $928,571 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 5/11/1991 to a minor league deal...
Released by Detroit on 7/12/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1992 to a minor league contract.
